name: angelfive-dsfm-repo
description: AngelOne Dashboard Replica with DSFM Analytics - Full Stack Financial Dashboard

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter backend dev" "pnpm --filter frontend dev" "pnpm --filter ml-service dev" --names "backend,frontend,ml-service" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow"
scripts.start: concurrently "pnpm --filter backend start" "pnpm --filter frontend start" "pnpm --filter ml-service start" --names "backend,frontend,ml-service" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter backend test && pnpm --filter ml-service test
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter backend clean && pnpm --filter frontend clean && pnpm --filter ml-service clean
scripts.setup: pnpm install:all && pnpm --filter backend install && pnpm --filter frontend install && pnpm --filter ml-service install

author: AngelFive Team
